body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Star Motors customer support. My name is Adam James. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Diana. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five, two two two, one one one one.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Diana. Can you also share your email address with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email address is diana.king@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for the information. How can I assist you today, Diana?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I have a concern about the quality of a product I purchased from your dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Diana. Let's address that. Thank you for bringing this to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Diana. If you need further assistance, feel free to contact us again. Have a great day.
